_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The heart's release by love [an10.219:11: They meditate spreading a heart full of love to one direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of love to the second direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of love to the third direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of love to the fourth direction
They spread a heart full of love to the whole world
They meditate spreading a heart full of compassion to one direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of compassion to the second direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of compassion to the third direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of compassion to the fourth direction
They spread a heart full of compassion to the whole world
The heart's release by rejoicing [an10.2: They meditate spreading a heart full of rejoicing to one direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of rejoicing to the second direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of rejoicing to the third direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of rejoicing to the fourth direction
They spread a heart full of rejoicing to the whole world
They meditate spreading a heart full of equanimity to one direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of equanimity to the second direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of equanimity to the third direction
They meditate spreading a heart full of equanimity to the fourth direction
They spread a heart full of equanimity to the whole world
